the_Manor

Class Enemy

  • java.lang.Object
    • the_Manor.Character
      • the_Manor.Fighter
        • the_Manor.Enemy

  • public class Enemy
extends Fighter

    This class represents all the characters who are enemies of the main character.

    Version:
    05/12/16
    Author:
    Group 6

    • Constructor Detail

      • Enemy

        public Enemy(java.lang.String newName,
             java.lang.String description,
             int nbMaxPV,
             int nbMaxStamina,
             int attack,
             int defense,
             java.lang.String image)
        The constructor for the Enemy class If the different parameters are null or under zero, a default value is settled.
        Parameters:
        newName - The name of the enemy
        description - The description of the enemy
        nbMaxPV - The enemy's max health points value
        nbMaxStamina - The enemy's max stamina points value
        attack - The enemy's max attack value
        defense - The enemy's max defense value
        image - The image of the enemy
